description.title: Visibility Config: subscribe, ContractCfg.TRANSPARENT, check storageAt
description.purpose: Uses a simple guessing game, with ContractCfg.TRANSPARENT. This opens up calls to get_storage_at, and additionally makes all events public. Two gateway connections are used, the first by a dev user that deploys the contract and the second by a player of the game. The player of the games attempts to use get_storage_at to try and figure out the secret number to guess, and to win the game in a single call.
